Black Pepe

About

Black Pepe is a cryptocurrency that has recently emerged inthe market. It is a meme coin that offers unique featuresand benefits to its users. With a carefully planned fundallocation strategy , Black Pepeaims to provide a valuable and profitable investmentopportunity for crypto enthusiasts.

Overview

Launch

The BLACK PEPE Token will be launched onPancakeSwap, one of the leading decentralizedexchanges in the Binance Smart Chain ecosystem. Thiswill provide a convenient and secure platform forinvestors to buy, sell and trade BLACK PEPE.

Fairlaunch

At BLACK PEPE, we are dedicated to a fair launch of our token on Pinksale.We understand the importance of transparency and fairness in the cryptomarket, and we are committed to upholding these values. In addition, wehave allocated 60% of the total fairlaunch sale to liquidity.

Marketing

2% of buy and 2% of sales will beallocated for marketing purposes,including promotion of the project onsocial media platforms, paid advertising,influencer partnerships, and othermarketing activities to increase visibilityand adoption of Black Pepe.

Token Allocation

As part of our commitment to fostering a fair, transparent, and thriving ecosystem for the Black Pepe Project, we would like to inform you of an important decision regarding token allocation.

In the interest of maintaining a healthy economy and ensuring equal opportunities for all participants, we have decided that the Black Pepe Project team will not receive any token allocations. This decision is made to avoid any potential conflicts of interest and to prevent an uneven distribution of tokens that could harm the project’s long-term growth and stability.
